sentence.Network_en: For some sauropod dinosaurs, this estimated blood pressure is very high indeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于某些蜥脚类恐龙来说, 测量出来的血压确实是相当高的.

sentence.Network_en: The sauropod dinosaurs were apparently herbivores.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜥脚类恐龙显然是草食动物.

sentence.Network_en: Giant Lufeng Long Shuyuan the sauropod dinosaur, is earlier than the Jurassic Period time has existed.
sentence.Network_cn: 巨型禄丰龙属原蜥脚类恐龙, 早于侏罗纪时期已存在.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生活在距今1.7亿年以前的蜥脚类恐龙（sauropod），如梁龙（Diplodocus），腕龙（Brachiosaurus）和雷脚龙（Brontomerus）这样 …
生活在距今1.7亿年以前的脚类恐龙（sauropod），如梁龙（Diplodocus），腕龙（Brachiosaurus）和雷脚龙（Brontomerus）这样的 …
蜥脚类动物（Sauropod）蜥脚类动物为庞大草食动物族群中的一族，以群居方式共生于平原上。
·在美国犹他州新发现了一种蜥脚龙（sauropod） 11年02月25日·自贡再次发现肉食性恐龙继和平永川龙后又一次重大发 07-05     ·西藏昌.

list.abs: 蜥脚类（sauropods）恐龙零散的骨头，大部分是肋骨和脉弧。这只綦江恐龙只保留了脊椎序列，以及不完整的头骨，却没有任何四肢 …
at up to 92 feet ( 28 meters ) and 50 tons , these sauropods ( large , herbivorous dinosaurs ) were much larger than any land animal alive today .在高达92英尺（28米)和50吨，这些蜥蜴类动物（大，草食性恐龙)要远远大于任何陆地上今天活着的动物。

Scott Williams of the Burpee Museum of Natural History , center , and Western Illinois University students Sara Reed , right , and Alexi Stauffer , left , prepare the shin of a sauropod dinosaur for study .Burpee自然历史博物馆的ScottWilliams（图中)，和西伊利诺伊大学的学生SaraRe
然而，最大的陆地恐龙之一——阿根廷龙(sauropod Argentinosaurus)重量仅有大约81,647公斤——仅比成年蓝鲸体重的一半多一点。 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from modern Latin Sauropoda (plural), from Greek sauros 'lizard' + pous, pod- 'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. very large herbivorous dinosaur of the Jurassic and Cretaceous having a small head a long neck and tail and five-toed limbs; largest known land animal

auth_sentence.content: Complete sauropod fossil finds are rare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Complete sauropod fossil finds are rare.

auth_sentence.content: But the discovery of the sauropod bone provides yet more evidence that scavenging did indeed take place, and on a wide scale.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the discovery of the sauropod bone provides yet more evidence that scavenging did indeed take place, and on a wide scale.

auth_sentence.content: The first true giants of the land were small-headed, long-necked, sauropod dinosaurs that appeared at the beginning of that time.
